flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
name: Elise Starseeker
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
